author: cstamas
msg: Added more concurrency related test: one that uses Merged context to do idx write + search from merged context, and one similar but instead of search perform publishing of merged context. This now fails the build, since there is a bug in IndexPacker, so the ConcurrentUseWithMergedContextPublishingTest test will fail (having IndexAlreadyClosed exceptions happening).
